markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Ignored](/Rules.aspx?ID=1238)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 164</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The PCs either aren’t on this group’s radar or the group knows about the PCs but is generally ambivalent to them. This is the default for most PCs with most groups, and it carries no special benefits or detriments.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Ignored
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 164</row>

Chapter 3: Subsystems / Reputation / Reputations
</additional-info>
